sections.title: Booking and Payment
sections.content: All bookings are subject to availability. Bookings can be made via phone call, WhatsApp, or through our website. Payment is to be made directly to the driver upon completion of the trip unless otherwise agreed. We accept cash payments. Rates quoted are subject to change without prior notice.

sections.title: Service Use
sections.content: Our services are intended for lawful purposes only. The customer is responsible for providing accurate pickup and drop locations. Any damage caused to the vehicle by the customer will be charged accordingly. Smoking and consumption of alcohol inside the vehicle is strictly prohibited.

sections.title: Liability
sections.content: Royal Tour & Travels shall not be held liable for any delays caused due to traffic, road conditions, weather, or any other circumstances beyond our control. We are not responsible for any loss or damage to personal belongings left in the vehicle. Our liability is limited to the fare paid for the trip.

sections.title: Cancellation and Refund Policy
sections.content: Cancellations made 24 hours before the scheduled trip: No charge. Cancellations made 12-24 hours before: 25% of the total fare will be charged. Cancellations made 6-12 hours before: 50% of the total fare will be charged. Cancellations made less than 6 hours before or no-show: Full fare will be charged. Refunds, if applicable, will be processed within 7 working days.

sections.title: Additional Charges
sections.content: Toll charges, parking fees, and state permit charges (if applicable) are to be borne by the customer unless included in the package. Night driving charges may apply for trips between 10:00 PM and 6:00 AM. Waiting charges of ₹100 per hour will be applied after 30 minutes of free waiting time.

sections.title: Modifications
sections.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. Continued use of our services after modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

sections.title: Dispute Resolution
sections.content: Any disputes arising from the use of our services shall be resolved amicably through mutual discussion. If a resolution cannot be reached, the matter shall be subject to the jurisdiction of courts in Gaya, Bihar.

sections.title: Communication
sections.content: By using our services, you consent to receive communications from us regarding your bookings, promotional offers, and service updates via phone calls, SMS, WhatsApp, and email. You can opt out of promotional communications at any time by contacting us.

sections.title: Consent
sections.content: By using our website and services, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms. Your continued use of the site following the posting of changes to this policy will be deemed your acceptance of those changes.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you use our services, including: your name, phone number, email address, pickup and drop locations, travel dates and preferences. We may also collect device information, browser type, and IP address when you visit our website.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to: process and manage your taxi bookings, communicate with you about your trips and provide customer support, send promotional offers and service updates (with your consent), improve our services and website experience, comply with legal obligations.

sections.title: Log Files
sections.content: Royal Tour & Travels follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log visitors when they visit websites. The information collected by log files includes internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable.

sections.title: Advertising Partners Privacy Policies
sections.content: Third-party ad servers or ad networks may use technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on Royal Tour & Travels, which are sent directly to users' browsers. They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs. These technologies are used to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and/or to personalize the advertising content that you see on websites.

sections.title: Third Party Privacy Policies
sections.content: Royal Tour & Travels' Privacy Policy does not apply to other advertisers or websites. Thus, we are advising you to consult the respective Privacy Policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information. It may include their practices and instructions about how to opt-out of certain options.

sections.title: CCPA Privacy Rights
sections.content: Under the CCPA, among other rights, California consumers have the right to: request that a business that collects a consumer's personal data disclose the categories and specific pieces of personal data collected, request that a business delete any personal data collected, request that a business that sells a consumer's personal data not sell the consumer's personal data.

sections.title: GDPR Data Protection Rights
sections.content: We would like to make sure you are fully aware of all of your data protection rights. Every user is entitled to the following: The right to access, The right to rectification, The right to erasure, The right to restrict processing, The right to object to processing, The right to data portability. If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you.

sections.title: Children's Information
sections.content: Another part of our priority is adding protection for children while using the internet. We encourage parents and guardians to observe, participate in, and/or monitor and guide their online activity. Royal Tour & Travels does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information from children under the age of 13.

sections.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
sections.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. Changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at royaltourandtravels.bodhgaya@gmail.com or call us at +91 9661838900.
